channel.title: RuneBank.org ~ 24/7 ~ Custom items ~ PKing ~ Skilling ~ minigames ~ Staff needed
channel.description:
RuneBank
Website: [url=http://www.runebank.org]RuneBank[/url] Webclient: [url=http://www.runebank.org/client.php]RuneBank Client[/url] Download client: [url=http://www.runebank.org/client.jar]www.runebank.org/client.jar[/url] Forum: [url=http://www.runebank.org/forum]RuneBank Forum[/url]
[ul][*]Home [*]Friendly Staff [*]Daily Updates [*]Slayer [*]Awesome PvP [*]MiniGames [*]Pking Places! [*]Skilling Places! [*]Shops around! [*]Donator shop [*]Auto vote system with vote shop [*][B]Staff needed![/B] [*]and much more on the server![/ul]
About RuneBank
Join our amazingly active community for loads of fun! There are loads of new people to meet, and enjoy playing along with them. There are hours of fun laying ahead of you. Along with skills, slayer tasks, bosses and mini games, the possibilities are almost endless! Also we have a nice forum where you can post anything about RuneBank!
[url=http://www.runebank.org][img]http://www.runebank.org/banner.gif[/img][/url]
